name: SuperMotocross
description:
In Super Motocross, player will be racing to reach the finishing line while jumping and do stunts to avoid obstacles along the course. Player skills and decision making ability will be tested to finish the race!

Controls
  • W or J - Move forward
  • A or D - Control front wheel
  • Space or K - Nitro boost

Tips: 

  1. Use Nitro boost on ramp to jump higher.
  2. On air, do flip twice to get free Nitro.
